title: Hanes Men's Moves Mesh T-Shirt, X-Temp Moisture-Wicking Tee, White Or Black/Grey, 3-Pack
description: DESIGN DETAILS - Features a Tagless interior and a classic crew neckline, perfect for layering under a jacket or hoodie.
QUICK DRYING - Breathable, lightweight mesh fabric dries fast.
FEEL GOOD - Exceptionally soft fabric feels great against the skin, perfect for workouts and beyond.
STAY COOL - Moisture-wicking mesh fabric lifts sweat away from the skin while X-TEMP technology is designed to adapt to the body temperature.
STAY COMFORTABLE - Stretch fabric delivers increased flexibility in a men’s undershirt that plays as hard as you do.
FEEL FRESH - Odor control helps keep you feeling fresh.

Made for versatility, Hanes Moves™ men’s mesh crewneck t-shirts seamlessly blend sporty style, comfort, and high performance. Comfortable enough for the kick-back days, but sweat-wicking and stretchy enough for the active days – this men’s undershirt is ready for work or play. It’s packed with moisture-wicking features designed to ensure that you start cool and keep cool while the lightweight mesh fabrication is breathable and quick drying. You’ll benefit from the built-in stretch that delivers increased flexibility. Finished with odor guard technology and featuring a Tagless® interior - so you can focus on your day without distractions. Classic crewneck styling makes it an ideal choice for layering. (Or not.) Hanes Moves. Ready for anything.
